thread.section_title: Hotel Jardin Le Brea - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Cute and efficient accommodations with friendly staff
thread.title_full: Cute and efficient accommodations with friendly staff - Review of Hotel Jardin Le Brea, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Tamar N
title: Cute and efficient accommodations with friendly staff
text:
Stayed for a week with a friend in a twin room. The elevator, stairs, and hallways are a bit tight, which some might find unusual, but it was not uncomfortable. The rooms were clean, cute, and quiet; and the bathroom was large by European standards. Daily breakfast was a great start to the day and they offer free coffee and tea all day in the lobby. All staff with whom we interacted were accommodating, friendly, and knowledgeable. There are several places to grab a bite nearby, Metro is very close (within a block), and the location is just off main boulevards, so very convenient. I would stay here again. Great value and location.
